source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT 
TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_ID) AS C_CANCELLATION_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELLATION_DATE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_TOTAMOUNT) AS C_CANCELLATION_TOTAMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_STATUS) AS C_CANCELLATION_STATUS,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTIONID_CANCELLED) AS C_TRANSACTIONID_CANCELLED,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTIONID_NEW) AS C_TRANSACTIONID_NEW,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_DOMAIN) AS C_CANCELLATION_DOMAIN,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_MODIFIEDBY) AS C_CANCELLATION_MODIFIEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_MODIFIEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELLATION_MODIFIEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_ID) AS C_STASIUN_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_ID) AS C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELREASON_ID) AS C_CANCELREASON_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_ID) AS C_SHIFT_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_NOKA) AS C_CANCELLATION_NOKA,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_TRAINNAME) AS C_CANCELLATION_TRAINNAME,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_MAXPRINT) AS C_CANCELLATION_MAXPRINT,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_CANCELNUM) AS C_CANCELLATION_CANCELNUM,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_PRINTEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELLATION_PRINTEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_CREATEDBY) AS C_CANCELLATION_CREATEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_CREATEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELLATION_CREATEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_SEQ) AS C_CANCELLATION_SEQ,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_IDORG) AS C_STASIUN_IDORG,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_CODEORG) AS C_STASIUN_CODEORG,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_IDDES) AS C_STASIUN_IDDES,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_CODEDES) AS C_STASIUN_CODEDES,
  TO_CHAR(C_WAGONCLASS_ID) AS C_WAGONCLASS_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_WAGONCLASS_CODE) AS C_WAGONCLASS_CODE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_PSGNUM) AS C_CANCELLATION_PSGNUM,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRIP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS C_TRIP_DATE,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRIP_ID) AS C_TRIP_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTION_LASTARRIVALDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_TRANSACTION_LASTARRIVALDATE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_NETAMOUNT) AS C_CANCELLATION_NETAMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTIONDET_IDCANCELLED) AS C_TRANSACTIONDET_IDCANCELLED,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTIONDET_IDNEW) AS C_TRANSACTIONDET_IDNEW,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_FEE) AS C_CANCELLATION_FEE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_DIFF) AS C_CANCELLATION_DIFF,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_AMOUNTTICKET) AS C_CANCELLATION_AMOUNTTICKET,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTIONDET_TICKETNUM) AS C_TRANSACTIONDET_TICKETNUM,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTION_BOOKCODE) AS C_TRANSACTION_BOOKCODE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_VACCINE) AS C_CANCELLATION_VACCINE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_PCR) AS C_CANCELLATION_PCR,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_ANTIGEN) AS C_CANCELLATION_ANTIGEN,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_GENOSE) AS C_CANCELLATION_GENOSE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_REFUND) AS C_CANCELLATION_REFUND,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_BURNAMOUNT) AS C_MEMBER_BURNAMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_BURNPOIN) AS C_MEMBER_BURNPOIN,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_BURNDIFFAMOUNT) AS C_MEMBER_BURNDIFFAMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_ID) AS C_MEMBER_ID
FROM RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_CANCELLATION WHERE TO_DATE(C_CANCELLATION_CREATEDON) >=  SYSDATE - 30

SELECT 
TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_REPRINTCOUNT) AS C_REFUND_REPRINTCOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_ID) AS C_MEMBER_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_BURNAMOUNT) AS C_MEMBER_BURNAMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_BURNPOIN) AS C_MEMBER_BURNPOIN,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_BURNDIFFAMOUNT) AS C_MEMBER_BURNDIFFAMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_ADDON_AMOUNT) AS C_ADDON_AMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_NETAMOUNT) AS C_CANCELLATION_NETAMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRIP_ID) AS C_TRIP_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTION_LASTARRIVALDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_TRANSACTION_LASTARRIVALDATE,
  C_TRANSACTION_BOOKCODE,
  C_TRANSACTION_PAYCODE,
  C_REFUND_EMAIL,
  C_REFUND_TYPE,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_ID) AS C_REFUND_ID,
  C_REFUND_PAYTYPE,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_PAYSTARTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_REFUND_PAYSTARTDATE,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_PAYENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_REFUND_PAYENDDATE,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_PAYDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_REFUND_PAYDATE,
  C_REFUND_BANKACCNUM,
  C_REFUND_BANKACCNAME,
  C_REFUND_STATUS,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_DOMAIN) AS C_REFUND_DOMAIN,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_MODIFIEDBY) AS C_REFUND_MODIFIEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_MODIFIEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_REFUND_MODIFIEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_BANK_ID) AS C_BANK_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_ID) AS C_STASIUN_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_MAXPRINT) AS C_REFUND_MAXPRINT,
  C_REFUND_REFUNDNUM,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_PRINTEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_REFUND_PRINTEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_TOTAMOUNT) AS C_REFUND_TOTAMOUNT,
  C_REFUND_PHONENUM,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_ID) AS C_SHIFT_ID,
  C_REFUND_NOKA,
  C_REFUND_CONTACTNAME,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_CREATEDBY) AS C_REFUND_CREATEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_CREATEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_REFUND_CREATEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_IDORG) AS C_STASIUN_IDORG,
  C_STASIUN_CODEORG,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_IDDES) AS C_STASIUN_IDDES,
  C_STASIUN_CODEDES,
  TO_CHAR(C_WAGONCLASS_ID) AS C_WAGONCLASS_ID,
  C_WAGONCLASS_CODE,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_PSGNUM) AS C_REFUND_PSGNUM,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRIP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS C_TRIP_DATE,
  C_CANCELLATION_CANCELNUM,
  C_REFUND_REF,
  C_REFUND_REF2,
  C_UNIT_CODE,
  C_USER_FULLNAME,
  C_USER_USERNAME
FROM RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_REFUND WHERE TO_DATE(C_REFUND_CREATEDON) >=  SYSDATE - 30

SELECT
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_ID) AS C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_ID,
  C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_NAME,
  C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_STATUS,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_DOMAIN) AS C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_DOMAIN,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_MODIFIEDBY) AS C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_MODIFIEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_MODIFIEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_MODIFIEDON,
  C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_CODE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_CREATEDBY) AS C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_CREATEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_CREATEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_CREATEDON
FROM RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_CANCELLATIONTYPE

SELECT

   C_CANCELREASON_STATUS,

   TO_CHAR(C_CANCELREASON_PERCENT) AS C_CANCELREASON_PERCENT,

   C_CANCELREASON_ROLE,

   TO_CHAR(C_CANCELREASON_CREATEDBY) AS C_CANCELREASON_CREATEDBY,

   TO_CHAR(C_CANCELREASON_CREATEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELREASON_CREATEDON,

   TO_CHAR(C_CANCELREASON_MODIFIEDBY) AS C_CANCELREASON_MODIFIEDBY,

   TO_CHAR(C_CANCELREASON_MODIFIEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELREASON_MODIFIEDON,

   TO_CHAR(C_CANCELREASON_ID) AS C_CANCELREASON_ID,

   C_CANCELREASON_DESC

 FROM RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_CANCELREASON

SELECT
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_ID) AS C_SHIFT_ID,
  C_SHIFT_NAME,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_OPENON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_SHIFT_OPENON,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_CLOSEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_SHIFT_CLOSEDON,
  C_SHIFT_STATUS,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_DOMAIN) AS C_SHIFT_DOMAIN,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_MODIFIEDBY) AS C_SHIFT_MODIFIEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_MODIFIEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_SHIFT_MODIFIEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_USER_ID) AS C_USER_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_UNIT_ID) AS C_UNIT_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_CREATEDBY) AS C_SHIFT_CREATEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_CREATEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_SHIFT_CREATEDON,
  C_USER_FULLNAME,
  C_UNIT_CODE,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_ID) AS C_STASIUN_ID,
  C_STASIUN_CODE,
  C_USER_USERNAME
FROM RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_SHIFT

SELECT
  C_STASIUN_LOCAL,
  C_STASIUN_INTERCITY,
  C_SERVICE_TYPE,
  C_SERVICE_STATUS,
  C_STASIUN_CONNECTING,
  C_STASIUN_FR,
  C_STASIUN_FRBOARDING,
  C_STASIUN_FRHIKV,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_GROUPID) AS C_STASIUN_GROUPID,
  C_STASIUN_CODE,
  C_STASIUN_PEMBATALAN,
  C_STASIUN_PENGEMBALIANBEA,
  C_STASIUN_STATUS,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_DOMAIN) AS C_STASIUN_DOMAIN,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_MODIFIEDBY) AS C_STASIUN_MODIFIEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_MODIFIEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_STASIUN_MODIFIEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_AREA_ID) AS C_AREA_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_CITY_ID) AS C_CITY_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_CREATEDBY) AS C_STASIUN_CREATEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_CREATEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_STASIUN_CREATEDON,
  C_STASIUN_SHOWPOS,
  C_STASIUN_SHOWIBOOK,
  C_STASIUN_SHOWMOBILE,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_STARTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_STASIUN_STARTDATE,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_STASIUN_ENDDATE,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_ID) AS C_STASIUN_ID,
  C_STASIUN_PROFITCENTER,
  C_STASIUN_NAME
FROM RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_STASIUN

text.value:
CREATE TABLE RTSNG_F_GETFIRSTDEPARTURE AS
SELECT
    C_TRANSACTIONDET_ID,
    RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_F_GETFIRSTDEPARTURE(TD.C_TRIP_ID, 1, 2) AS DEPARTURE
FROM
    RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_TRANSACTIONDET TD
    JOIN RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_STASIUN ST ON ST.C_STASIUN_ID = TD.C_STASIUN_IDORG
    JOIN RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_AREA AR ON ST.C_AREA_ID = AR.C_AREA_ID
    JOIN RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_SCHEDULE S ON S.C_SCHEDULE_ID = TD.C_SCHEDULE_ID
    LEFT JOIN RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_TRANSDISTANCE DIS ON TD.C_TRANSACTIONDET_TICKETNUM = DIS.C_TRANSACTIONDET_TICKETNUM
WHERE
    TD.C_TRANSACTIONDET_STATUS IN ('2', '5')
    AND TD.C_TRIP_DATE = '2025-01-01';
